in the ends and block the snowflakes taking care to pin out the loops and picots into the shape you would like once dry wet the flakes with either water or spray starch and leave them overnight once dry carefully unpin the flakes and use some extra thread to tie a small loop for hanging tips picots - when making a slip_stitch into the chain to make a picot insert your hook into the chain so that two loops of the chain are lifted over the top of the hook and only one is below the hook this will give you a neater and tighter finish tight stitches - if you re having trouble pulling the yarn through those tight stitches try rolling the hook with your fingers so that the head twists away from you it will slip through a lot more smoothly stiffening - carefully paint pva glue onto the back with a brush and then leave to dry this will give a nice stiff finish to your motifs perfect to help it keep it s shape
